install.author: Daniel Eliasson
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2008 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin pings Update Services whenever you save an article in a certain sektion. If you like this plugin, don't forget to vote for it on Joomla extensions.

param.name: section_id
param.label: Sektion ID
param.description: Enter a sektion ID to ping update services for when a new article is saved. The ID must be a numerical value, for example 10. Note that this plugin is restricted to work on one section only, since most update services will consider i spam if it's not a real blog post. Good practice would be to create a blog section, and enter the ID for that section here.

param.name: pinglist
param.label: Ping Update Services
param.description: When you publish a new post, Blogping automatically notifies the following site update services. Separate multiple service URLs with line breaks. You should not enter more than 10 services, since it would take a lot of time when you save your articles. Don't forget that every new entry should begin with http://

param.name: pingnew
param.label: Ping only new articles?
param.description: Ping only when an article is new and just created? We recommend yes on this one. If you set this to no, a ping will be sent everytime you make a change to an article which could be considered spam.
